title: Linear Search Algorithm
subject: Algorithms
theory: Walk through the list from start to finish. Compare each element with the target. Return index if found, else -1. Works on any list.
syntax: for x in arr: if x==target: return True

real_world_use_cases.scenario: Finding a sock in a messy pile
real_world_use_cases.description: You pick one by one until you find the match.
